messages.noBotsToDelete: No bots to delete (only stopped bots can be deleted)
messages.resultEnableSkipped: {count} bot(s) could not be started due to insufficient balance, wallet status, or strategy amount exceeding plan limit.
messages.resultPendingAutoStart: {count} bot(s) pending wallet activation and will start automatically once wallets are activated.

batchDelete.message: All stopped bots are about to be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete these bots?
batchDelete.title: Delete Bots

batchDisable.message: All running bots are about to stop. However, orders that have already been placed will not be automatically canceled. Are you sure you want to stop all bots?
batchDisable.title: Stop Bots

batchEnable.message: All stopped bots are about to start. Once started, they will begin using funds in their wallets to place orders, which may result in profits or losses. Are you sure you want to start all bots?
batchEnable.title: Start Bots

byConditions.hint: All bots matching the selected conditions will be affected.
byConditions.intervalDisabledHint: Interval filter is disabled because a strategy is selected
byConditions.strategyDisabledHint: Strategy filter is disabled because intervals are selected
